title: 50 Nintendo Switch Games Discounted, Including Dozens Of Mario, Zelda, And Pokemon Titles
description: Nintendo finally unveiled the Switch 2 this week with a brief teaser trailer. The full reveal is slated for a Nintendo Direct on April 2, so fans will have to wait a few more months to find out when the next-gen console hits store shelves. In the meantime, you can clear out your Switch wishlist and chip away at your backlog for less thanks to Woot's massive ongoing Nintendo Switch game sale. Dozens of Switch games, many of which are exclusives, are discounted at the Amazon-owned retailer. The lineup of Switch game deals includes a bunch of Super Mario, Pokemon, and Zelda games. See all Switch deals at Woot Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: Woot's current batch of Nintendo Switch game deals includes all of the recently released exclusives and rarely discounted gems.
text: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links. Nintendo finally unveiled the Switch 2 this week with a brief teaser trailer. The full reveal is slated for a Nintendo Direct on April 2, so fans will have to wait a few more months to find out when the next-gen console hits store shelves. In the meantime, you can clear out your Switch wishlist and chip away at your backlog for less thanks to Woot's massive ongoing Nintendo Switch game sale. Dozens of Switch games, many of which are exclusives, are discounted at the Amazon-owned retailer. The lineup of Switch game deals includes a bunch of Super Mario, Pokemon, and Zelda games.For starters, Woot has discounts on all of Nintendo's biggest exclusives released in the past year, including Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, which just released (January 16). Check out the full list of 50 games below. The retailer no longer discloses whether you are getting a North American release or an imported game. All Nintendo Switch games are region-free, and every game in the list above is playable in English. That said, this is important to consider for games with DLC, such as Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and Pokemon Scarlet & Violet. If you do not get a North American version and want the DLC, you will need to purchase that content from the eShop matching your game. Movie Limited Edition Steelbook - Exclusive to Walmart, releases March 4Nintendo fans will be pleased to learn that the Collectible Steelbook Edition of The Super Mario Bros. Movie on 4K Blu-ray is back in stock at Walmart for $28. This edition launched in June 2023 and, outside of a few briefly available restocks, has been sold out since then. Walmart is also taking preorders for an exclusive Limited Edition Steelbook of the Mario Movie on 4K Blu-ray for $35. The upcoming edition comes with a Question Block steelbook case, whereas the original featured a Super Mushroom. Walmart's exclusive version releases March 4, but the original is available to ship now. Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Nintendo finally unveiled the Switch 2 this week with a brief teaser trailer. The full reveal is slated for a Nintendo Direct on April 2, so fans will have to wait a few more months to find out when the next-gen console hits store shelves. In the meantime, you can clear out your Switch wishlist and chip away at your backlog for less thanks to Woot's massive ongoing Nintendo Switch game sale. Dozens of Switch games, many of which are exclusives, are discounted at the Amazon-owned retailer. The lineup of Switch game deals includes a bunch of Super Mario, Pokemon, and Zelda games.

For starters, Woot has discounts on all of Nintendo's biggest exclusives released in the past year, including Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, which just released (January 16). DKC Returns is joined by nice discounts on the pair of Mario role-playing games from. 2024--Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door and Mario & Luigi: Brothership--as well as Luigi's Mansion 2 HD and Princess Peach: Showtime.

Nintendo's newest Switch-exclusive games:

  • Donkey Kong Country Returns HD -- $50 ($60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom -- $50 ($60)
  • Luigi's Mansion 2 HD -- $45 ($60)
  • Mario & Luigi: Brothership -- $50 ($60)
  • Mario vs. Donkey Kong -- $42 ($50)
  • Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition -- $25 ($30)
  • Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door -- $43 ($60)
  • Princess Peach: Showtime -- $45 ($60)
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree -- $50 ($60)

But those recent Nintendo games only represent a small sample of Woot's Switch game deals. Check out the full list of 50 games below. Other highlights include rarely discounted games such as Metroid Dread, Detective Pikachu Returns, Xenoblade Chronicles: Definitive Edition, Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3, and both Hyrule Warriors games: Age of Calamity and the Definitive Edition of the original.

All Nintendo Switch Game Deals at Woot (January 2025)

  • Animal Crossing: New Horizons -- $40 ($60)
  • Bayonetta 2 -- $45 ($60)
  • Bayonetta Origins -- $35 ($60)
  • Detective Pikachu Returns -- $40 ($50)
  • Donkey Kong Country Returns HD -- $50 ($60)
  • Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze -- $42 ($60)
  • Doom Anthology - Steelbook + BFG Replica -- $55 ($80)
  • Dragon Quest I-III Collection -- $42 ($60)
  • Everybody 1-2 Switch! -- $13 ($30)
  • The Elder Scrolls. V: Skyrim -- $45 ($60)
  • Fire Emblem Engage -- $40 ($60)
  • Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes -- $27 ($60)
  • Harvest Moon: One World Complete -- $20 ($40)
  • Hyrule Warriors: Definitive Edition -- $44 ($60)
  • Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity -- $42 ($60)
  • Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe -- $40 ($60)
  • Kirby Star Allies -- $40 ($60)
  • Kirby and the Forgotten Land -- $40 ($60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom -- $50 ($60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening -- $45 ($60)
  • The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom -- $45 ($70)
  • Luigi's Mansion 2 HD -- $45 ($60)
  • Luigi's Mansion 3 -- $40 ($60)
  • Mario & Luigi: Brothership -- $50 ($60)
  • Mario Golf: Super Rush -- $40 ($60)
  • Mario Kart 8 Deluxe -- $42 ($60)
  • Mario Party Superstars -- $40 ($60)
  • Mario vs. Donkey Kong -- $42 ($50)
  • Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order -- $45 ($60)
  • Metroid Dread -- $42 ($60)
  • New Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe -- $40 ($60)
  • Nintendo World Championships: NES Edition -- $25 ($30)
  • Octopath Traveler -- $45 ($60)
  • Paper Mario: The Origami King -- $42 ($60)
  • Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door -- $43 ($60)
  • Pokemon Brilliant Diamond -- $43 ($60)
  • Pokemon Legends: Arceus -- $45 ($60)
  • Pokemon: Let's Go, Eevee -- $40 ($60)
  • Pokemon: Let's Go, Pikachu -- $42 ($60)
  • Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX -- $42 ($60)
  • Pokemon Shield -- $40 ($60)
  • Pokemon Sword -- $42 ($60)
  • Pokemon Scarlet -- $42 ($60)
  • Pokemon Violet -- $42 ($60)
  • Pokemon Scarlet & Violet Double Pack -- $85 ($120)
  • Princess Peach: Showtime -- $45 ($60)
  • Radiant Tale: Fanfare -- $35 ($50)
  • Reynatis: Deluxe Edition -- $35 ($60)
  • Ring Fit Adventure -- $55 ($80)
  • Sonic X Shadow Generations -- $37 ($50)
  • Splatoon 3 -- $42 ($60)
  • Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury -- $42 ($60)
  • Super Mario Maker 2 -- $42 ($60)
  • Super Mario Odyssey -- $40 ($60)
  • Super Mario Party -- $40 ($60)
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree -- $50 ($60)
  • Super Smash Bros. Ultimate -- $43 ($60)
  • Xenoblade Chronicles: Definitive Edition -- $40 ($60)
  • Yoshi's Crafted World -- $40 ($60)

Nintendo Hardware Deals

  • Nintendo Switch Console - Animal Crossing: New Horizons Edition -- $345
  • Nintendo Switch OLED - Mario Kart 8 Deluxe 2024 Holiday Bundle -- $330 ($350)
  • Nintendo Game & Watch: Super Mario Bros. -- $39 ($50)

Woot sells region-free Nintendo Switch games

Woot recently made a change to its Nintendo Switch game listings. The retailer no longer discloses whether you are getting a North American release or an imported game. All Nintendo Switch games are region-free, and every game in the list above is playable in English. That said, this is important to consider for games with DLC, such as Mario Kart 8 Deluxe and Pokemon Scarlet & Violet. If you do not get a North American version and want the DLC, you will need to purchase that content from the eShop matching your game. So if you get a UK game, you need to download DLC from the UK eShop, which requires making a separate Nintendo account. Not many games in the list above--or Nintendo games in general--have DLC, but this is worth keeping in mind.

The Super Mario Bros. Movie Steelbook Editions

Nintendo fans will be pleased to learn that the Collectible Steelbook Edition of The Super Mario Bros. Movie on 4K Blu-ray is back in stock at Walmart for $28. This edition launched in June 2023 and, outside of a few briefly available restocks, has been sold out since then. Walmart is also taking preorders for an exclusive Limited Edition Steelbook of the Mario Movie on 4K Blu-ray for $35. The upcoming edition comes with a Question Block steelbook case, whereas the original featured a Super Mushroom. Walmart's exclusive version releases March 4, but the original is available to ship now.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
